data.introduce: 用户可通过OrderChangeRQ/OrderViewRS消息对来更改已有订单的内容，包含增加、修改及更新已有航班、附加服务、座位等，还可以通过OrderChange接口对追加的机票、附加服务以及座位进行支付并出票（包含客票及EMD）。
data.business:
目前支持的业务范围：
机票的预订及改签；
座位的预订及支付出票；
预订后追加附加服务，预订及支付出票；
BOP的支付出票（客票及EMD，仅针对QF及AA中国大陆代理人）；
修改已有订单的内容，包含联系人信息、常旅客信息等。
支持全服务航司及低成本航司。
目前不支持的业务范围：
附加服务的改签；
混合支付。
典型业务场景：延迟支付出票
接口调用顺序：机票查询，验价，创建订单，出票（延迟支付）
1. AirShoppingRQ / AirShoppingRS
2. OfferPriceRQ / OfferPriceRS
3. OrderCreateRQ/ OrderViewRS
4. OrdearChangeRQ(with FOP) / OrderViewRS
实例XML：
现金支付实例： EMBED   \* MERGEFORMAT    信用卡支付实例： EMBED   \* MERGEFORMAT

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 下单出票后追加附加服务.xml
qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<IATA_OrderChangeRQ>
    <MessageDoc>
        <Name>SQ</Name>
    </MessageDoc>
    <Party>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgency>
                <PseudoCityID>AGG002</PseudoCityID>
                <AgencyID>AggSky_AGG002</AgencyID>
            </TravelAgency>
        </Sender>
    </Party>
    <PayloadAttributes>
        <TrxID>8b24252901bf43bb97945c2fc62147e0</TrxID>
        <VersionNumber>18.2</VersionNumber>
    </PayloadAttributes>
    <Request>
        <ChangeOrder>
            <UpdateOrderItem>
                <AcceptOffer>
                    <SelectedOffer>
                        <OfferRefID>SQ_OFF_d6cd36470118c48d07e224802aa06f4428735047ba50025eea2b11d99cd3d5ea</OfferRefID>
                        <OwnerCode>SQ</OwnerCode>
                        <SelectedOfferItem>
                            <OfferItemRefID>SQ_OFFI_d6cd36470118c48d07e224802aa06f44b198ad195dbf6ff26ee226b954294d8d</OfferItemRefID>
                            <PaxRefID>PAX1</PaxRefID>
                            <SelectedBundleServices>
                                <SelectedServiceRefID>SQ_SERD_57312716cb82099d38b9ca7a63c7d007</SelectedServiceRefID>
                            </SelectedBundleServices>
                        </SelectedOfferItem>
                        <ShoppingResponseRefID>SQ_SHOR_d6cd36470118c48d07e224802aa06f44f0ee51508fe19ae14841fad6c983b37d</ShoppingResponseRefID>
                    </SelectedOffer>
                </AcceptOffer>
            </UpdateOrderItem>
        </ChangeOrder>
        <DataLists>
            <ContactInfoList>
                <ContactInfo>
                    <ContactInfoID>CON1</ContactInfoID>
                    <ContactTypeText>Order</ContactTypeText>
                    <EmailAddress>
                        <EmailAddressText>86</EmailAddressText>
                        <LabelText>home</LabelText>
                    </EmailAddress>
                    <Phone>
                        <AreaCodeNumber>86</AreaCodeNumber>
                        <CountryDialingCode>+86</CountryDialingCode>
                        <LabelText>Mobile</LabelText>
                        <PhoneNumber>86</PhoneNumber>
                    </Phone>
                    <PostalAddress>
                        <BuildingRoomText>86</BuildingRoomText>
                        <CityName>86</CityName>
                        <CountryCode>86</CountryCode>
                        <CountrySubDivisionName>86</CountrySubDivisionName>
                        <PostalCode>86</PostalCode>
                        <StreetText>86</StreetText>
                    </PostalAddress>
                </ContactInfo>
                <ContactInfo>
                    <ContactInfoID>Payer</ContactInfoID>
                    <ContactTypeText>Payer</ContactTypeText>
                    <EmailAddress>
                        <EmailAddressText>86</EmailAddressText>
                        <LabelText>home</LabelText>
                    </EmailAddress>
                    <Phone>
                        <AreaCodeNumber>86</AreaCodeNumber>
                        <CountryDialingCode>+86</CountryDialingCode>
                        <LabelText>Mobile</LabelText>
                        <PhoneNumber>86</PhoneNumber>
                    </Phone>
                    <PostalAddress>
                        <BuildingRoomText>86</BuildingRoomText>
                        <CityName>86</CityName>
                        <CountryCode>86</CountryCode>
                        <CountrySubDivisionName>86</CountrySubDivisionName>
                        <PostalCode>86</PostalCode>
                        <StreetText>86</StreetText>
                    </PostalAddress>
                </ContactInfo>
            </ContactInfoList>
            <PaxList>
                <Pax>
                    <ContactInfoRefID>CON1</ContactInfoRefID>
                    <Individual>
                        <Birthdate>1990-01-01</Birthdate>
                        <GenderCode>M</GenderCode>
                        <GivenName>CHE</GivenName>
                        <Surname>TONGTONG</Surname>
                        <TitleName>MR</TitleName>
                    </Individual>
                    <PaxID>PAX1</PaxID>
                    <PTC>ADT</PTC>
                </Pax>
            </PaxList>
            <ServiceDefinitionList>
                <ServiceDefinition>
                    <BookingInstructions>
                        <SpecialService>
                            <FreeText>TTL1KG</FreeText>
                        </SpecialService>
                    </BookingInstructions>
                    <Desc>
                        <DescText>1:F</DescText>
                    </Desc>
                    <Name>ONE KILOGRAM BAGGAGE</Name>
                    <ServiceDefinitionID>SQ_SERD_57312716cb82099d38b9ca7a63c7d007</ServiceDefinitionID>
                </ServiceDefinition>
            </ServiceDefinitionList>
        </DataLists>
        <Order>
            <OrderID>SQ_ORD_313e582ab89e2befdd02bf55db9097e5</OrderID>
            <OwnerCode>SQ</OwnerCode>
        </Order>
        <PaymentInfo>
            <Amount CurCode="CNY">40</Amount>
            <ContactInfoRefID>Payer</ContactInfoRefID>
            <PaymentMethod>
                <PaymentCard>
                    <CardBrandCode>VI</CardBrandCode>
                    <CardHolderName>SMITH SMITH</CardHolderName>
                    <CardNumber>4012999999999999</CardNumber>
                    <CardSecurityCode>123</CardSecurityCode>
                    <ExpirationDate>1020</ExpirationDate>
                </PaymentCard>
            </PaymentMethod>
            <TypeCode>CC</TypeCode>
        </PaymentInfo>
    </Request>
</IATA_OrderChangeRQ>

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 指定舱位+多旅客+信用卡支付出票+退票.xml
qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<IATA_OrderChangeRQ>
    <PayloadAttributes>
        <VersionNumber>18.2</VersionNumber>
        <TrxID>6b5ca0b790a045aeb77886e7f48214a2</TrxID>
    </PayloadAttributes>
    <Party>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgency>
                <PseudoCityID>AGG002</PseudoCityID>
                <AgencyID>aggtest_BJS191</AgencyID>
            </TravelAgency>
        </Sender>
    </Party>
    <MessageDoc>
        <Name>SQ</Name>
    </MessageDoc>
    <Request>
        <Order>
            <!-- 翻译：航司二字码 -->
            <OwnerCode>SQ</OwnerCode>
            <!-- 订单号 -->
            <OrderID>SQ_ORD_9b8e13868e0200771cac9fd762f81149</OrderID>
        </Order>
        <PaymentInfo>
            <Amount CurCode="CNY">65265</Amount>
            <TypeCode>CC</TypeCode>
            <PaymentMethod>
                <PaymentCard>
                    <CardNumber>4147200022000006</CardNumber>
                    <CardSecurityCode>123</CardSecurityCode>
                    <CardBrandCode>VI</CardBrandCode>
                    <ExpirationDate>1020</ExpirationDate>
                </PaymentCard>
            </PaymentMethod>
        </PaymentInfo>
    </Request>
    <AugmentationPoint>
        <PayloadAttributes>
            <TrxID>123456</TrxID>
        </PayloadAttributes>
    </AugmentationPoint>
</IATA_OrderChangeRQ>
